title: India wins Asia Cup 2025
description: India defeated Pakistan in the final match with a thrilling performance.

title: ISRO successfully launches Gaganyaan
description: India's first crewed space mission has been launched from Sriharikota.

title: Mumbai Metro Line 3 nears completion
description: The Mumbai Metro Line 3 is expected to be completed by December and reduce road traffic significantly.

title: National Education Policy 2025 announced
description: The NEP 2025 focuses on skill-based education and AI-integrated curriculum from Grade 6 onwards.
